channel.title: CVE Feed for Wise Agent Capture Forms -- Wise Agent Capture Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wise Agent Capture Forms -- Wise Agent Capture Forms

item.title: CVE-2021-38335|2024-09-17T03:02:39.184Z -- wise%20agent%20capture%20forms -- wise%20agent%20capture%20forms
item.description: The Wise Agent Capture Forms WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to a reflected $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"] value in the ~/WiseAgentCaptureForm.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.
